Module com.example.cs213_cafe_project
Package com.example.cs213_cafe_project

Class OrderBasketController

java.lang.Object
com.example.cs213_cafe_project.OrderBasketController
public class OrderBasketController extends Object
Controller class for orderBasket.fxml Does all the event handling and the action handling for the orderBasket. Sends and receives data with the mainController.

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderBasketController

      public OrderBasketController()

  • Method Details

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(MainController controller)
      Initializes an instance of the mainController and sets mainController to that value
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller class object

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      init method that runs as soon as the .fxml file is set and staged - set all monetary textFields to $0.00 - Disable all buttons until the load basket button is clicked to fetch data from mainController

    • setLoadBasket

      public void setLoadBasket()
      Loads all the basket items from the mainController data storage into our listView. The items can then be selected and some action carried out. Enables all the other functionalities. Sets the init values for the $ amounts in the textFields.

    • listViewSelected

      public void listViewSelected()
      Checks to see if the listView has been selected. If there is a value that has been selected, the remove button will be enabled.

    • removeSelectedItem

      public void removeSelectedItem()
      event handler for the remove button Will remove the selected basketItem and update the prices that are displayed in the textFields.

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder()
      Resets the entire page to what it was when initialized. Sends the data to the mainController as an order and will be added to the data storage of list of orders.

    • createOrder

      private int createOrder()
      Creates an order object based on the input fields.
      Returns:
      integer orderNumber associated with the order that was just created.

    • generateOrderNumber

      private int generateOrderNumber()
      Generates a random OrderNumber and checks that it is not currently in use. If the number is already in use it will keep creating orderNumbers until a unique number is found.
      Returns:
      integer order-number.

    • createOrderList

      private void createOrderList(ArrayList<BasketItem> orderList, javafx.collections.ObservableList<BasketItem> fullBasket)
      Creates the list of orders and sets the reference of this new object to the reference in the mainController data storage. Now this new object will be accessed to get a list of all the active orders.
      Parameters:
      orderList - The existing list of orders that we want to add our new order to
      fullBasket - the list of basketItems that we are going to package into a new order.

    • setBasketPrice

      private void setBasketPrice(javafx.collections.ObservableList<BasketItem> basket)
      Helper method to set the values of the textFields whenever there is some additive action (LOAD) or negative action (REMOVE)
      Parameters:
      basket - A list of all basket items that our method will loop through to calculate the price.

    • format

      private String format(double amount)
      Helper method to format a double as a monetary amount
      Parameters:
      amount - double amount=
      Returns:
      String monetary value Ex: 7.58 --> "$7.58"
